title: Daily calendar reminders

title: Weekly security audits
description: Run security audit every Monday at 9 AM. Check for vulnerabilities, review access controls, and verify backup integrity.

description: Automated GitHub backup runs at 2 AM daily. Commit and push workspace changes to the openclaw-cipher-workspace repo.

title: Weekly OpenClaw security research
description: Every Monday at 9 AM: Research latest OpenClaw vulnerabilities, patches, and security advisories. Stay current on agentic security risks.

description: Calendar currently shows events but read operations fail. Investigate and fix the Google Calendar API read access permissions.
